name: The Jewel's Arc
description:
[UPDATED JAN 23 2022 1850H: v1.1. Tweaked the rate at which platforms move and the number of dart traps for some levels. Hope it's more balanced!]

You have just stolen a beautiful, priceless gem from a temple. And yet, maybe it can do more than just look pretty in your hands. You and your new jewel must now work together to overcome the booby traps of the temple. Expect poison darts, pits of spikes and even portals: you and your jewel must go through them all, together. 

Controls: 

  • A and D to move 
  • Left click and drag on the player to throw the jewel 
  • E for picking up the jewel 
  • F for interact 

Made by Team lowerCamelCase:

  • Code by Loo Xin Wei 
  • Design by Yong Jia Yu 
  • Art by Kenneth Hong Jia Wei
